"Peppy Rappy": "Finally... At long last, we've found the elusive Rappy Assembly! ...Thank you so much!"
"This will surely go down in Rappy history as a spectacular discovery."
"By all means, enjoy the Rappy Assembly to your heart's content! When you're done, I'd like to give you one last request."
"When you've had your fill, would you come back to where I am? Thanks again."
